known_issues: Runtime error: "useLanguage must be used within a LanguageProvider" (hook used outside provider context).

existing_features.title: Ensure the React component tree is wrapped in `LanguageProvider` so any call to `useLanguage()` (e.g., in `frontend/src/App.tsx` and `frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout.tsx`) is always within provider context, eliminating the runtime error "useLanguage must be used within a LanguageProvider".

projectName: Fix runtime error: useLanguage used outside LanguageProvider
